profile:
At Simplepace, we specialize in custom closet design and installation. We can also help with a kitchen pantry, home office, laundry room, library wall unit, or a custom entertainment centre. Our expertise also involves garage and basement storage systems. 

Simplespace will design, build and install closet storage solutions, specific to your space and requirements, that will be a pleasure to use for years to come.

From the basic to the elaborate, Simplespace can exceed your custom closet and home storage expectations in every room in the house. 

We have a showroom and a shop in our Montreal facility, with sufficient inventory of all components to allow us to design, build, and install your closet in 2-4 weeks. 

Please contact us for a free consultation.
